about_the_game:
Description:
Step into the futuristic world of "LustRunner 3069: Tokyo Crisis," where the bustling streets of Tokyo serve as the backdrop for an electrifying adventure. As players assume the role of Akira, The Bounty Hunter, they'll embark on a perilous mission to apprehend the leader of a human trafficking gang.

Set in the year 3069, this visual novel plunges players into a cyberpunk dystopia, where neon lights and towering skyscrapers cast shadows over the city's secrets. Akira's journey unfolds amidst a web of intrigue, danger, and unexpected alliances, as she navigates through the underbelly of Tokyo's criminal underworld.

But Akira soon discovers that she's facing more than just ordinary thugs – her adversaries possess dark powers and hidden agendas. As the narrative unfolds, players will delve deeper into the mysteries of Tokyo, uncovering shocking truths and confronting moral dilemmas along the way.

"LustRunner 3069: Tokyo Crisis" offers a captivating blend of action, suspense, and character-driven storytelling, inviting players to immerse themselves in a world where every choice matters. Will you help Akira unravel the secrets of Tokyo and bring justice to the streets, or will you succumb to the temptations and dangers lurking in the shadows?

Features
  • Intriguing Storyline with Unexpected Twists: Experience a captivating narrative filled with suspense and surprise.
  • Cyberpunk Atmosphere: Immerse yourself in a richly detailed, neon-lit world of futuristic Tokyo.
  • Stunning Visuals: Enjoy high-quality artwork and beautifully rendered scenes that bring the story to life.
  • Cool Soundtracks: Get lost in an immersive audio experience with a carefully curated soundtrack that complements the cyberpunk setting.
  • Incredible Group Sex Scenes: Engage in steamy, explicit content designed for mature audiences.
  • One-Handed Play: Designed for convenience, allowing you to enjoy the game with just one hand.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains the following sexual content: sexual acts, sexual violence, extreme violence(torture), group sex, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, sexual slavery.
The app involves topics that customers may have a sensitivity to, and would like to be aware of, such as Bondage, BDSM elemens.
This game doesn't contains the following content: self-harm, suicide, drug/alcohol abuse.
This game is for ADULTS only and it includes explicit, sexual content that some viewers may find offensive. The characters shown in the game are all over 20 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Steam OS or Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: LustRunner 3069: Tokyo Crisis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4700
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4000
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
